name: Healthbox
tag_list: healthcare, healthcare-startups, accelerator, business-accelerator, incubator, business-incubator
overview:
Healthbox is a platform to stimulate early-stage innovation, enabling entrepreneurial success while creating a collaborative, global ecosystem to build positive change in the healthcare industry.

Healthbox brings together a brain trust of entrepreneurs, strategic partners, industry experts and investors to tackle real healthcare challenges.

The Healthbox accelerator creates a platform for meaningful collaboration and an opportunity to discover disruptive innovation on the system’s periphery. By partnering healthcare’s most promising startups with prominent organizations, Healthbox achieves its dual mission to empower entrepreneurs while catalyzing the industry to seek new solutions and think about change differently.

Healthbox has successfully launched three programs in 2012, located in Chicago, Boston and London. Hundreds of startups applied to participate. Our broad and diverse applicant pool allows us to select the ten startups that are both focused on a key industry challenge and best poised for rapid growth.

The 16-week program is structure to address the unique challenges healthcare entrepreneurs face by providing them seed capital, an expert network, a collaborative workspace, a business framework and access to industry partners. Healthcare startups are motivated to reach critical milestones through a rigorous curriculum.
